_comment_id: REQUIRED: Unique plugin identifier. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. This becomes your API route prefix: /api/plugins/{id}/
_comment_name: REQUIRED: Human-readable name displayed in the UI
name: Sample Plugin
_comment_description: REQUIRED: Brief description (1-2 sentences) shown in plugin listings
description: A comprehensive sample plugin demonstrating all available features, event handlers, routes, and dashboard widgets.
_comment_version: REQUIRED: Semantic version (major.minor.patch). Increment on each release.
author: VerifyWise
_comment_type: REQUIRED: Plugin category. One of: integration, feature, framework, reporting
_comment_tags: OPTIONAL: Searchable keywords for marketplace discovery
_comment_permissions: REQUIRED: Declare what your plugin needs access to. Only request what you actually use.
_comment_config: OPTIONAL: Define user-configurable settings. Each field creates a form input in the plugin settings UI.

apiEndpoint.label: API endpoint
apiEndpoint.description: External API URL to connect to (optional)

maxItems.label: Maximum items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to store

_comment_ui: OPTIONAL: Define UI extensions. Currently supports dashboard widgets.

dashboardWidgets._comment: Each widget needs: id (unique within plugin), template (rendering type), title, endpoint (your route)
dashboardWidgets.title: Sample stats

_comment_dependencies: OPTIONAL: Other plugins that must be installed first
